p: Herbivory significantly reduced shoot biomass on average by 26% at the Czech site, 32% at the German site and 54% at the Dutch site (Table 1; Fig. 2, comparison of shoot biomass without and with herbivory, post hoc tests for effect of herbivory treatment within site, P = 0.008 for Czech site, P < 0.0001 for the Dutch and German sites). The biomass of the German populations was not affected by herbivory at the Czech site (Fig. 2).
